header.h2: Godley ISD Closed For Remainder of 2019-2020 School Year

div.p: GISD campuses will remain closed for the remainder of the current school year. If you have questions, please directly contact your students' campus.

img.alt: gisd closed remainder of school year

h3.a: Godley ISD Closed For Remainder of 2019-2020 School Year

div.div: GISD campuses will remain closed for the remainder of the current school year. If you have questions, please directly contact your students' campus.
The Senior Class will be able to pick up their caps and gowns on Friday, April 24th, at 10am. For more information, please read here.
GISD is hiring for multiple positions within our District! Please click here for more information.
All information and resources during the COVID-19 campus closures can be found on the new website below.

h3.a: Update from GISD Administration as of 3/20/20

div.div: Please read the latest statement with information regarding campus closures due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

h3.a: Food Distribution During Closure Amid COVID-19

div.div: Please read GISD's plan for distributing meals to all students during the district-wide closure beginning on March 23rd and complete the necessary form.
